Affiliate

Program

If you are a Content Creator, Influencer or Affiliate join us to earn commissions.

Join now
Who can register?

Micro-Influencer / Creator

You identify yourself as a content creator who loves to give recommendations and reviews to your loyal followers (minimum 5K).

Mega-Influencer

You are an individual with huge and well-established social media followers, your posts are enough to make your followers want to purchase that item as soon as possible!

Affiliate

You have a Website or Social Media Page that allows you to operate in the fields of Cashback, Deals, Reviews, Email Marketing, Loyalty Programs, Coupons, Price Comparisons, or similar ventures.

How does it work?

Register

tart working immediately if you are an affiliate or receive approval within a week if you're a content creator / influencer.

Advertise

Promote Ecommerce’s various campaigns and enjoy tracking links up to 7 days as well as discount codes.

Earn

Get compensated for your sales with the payment method you choose at the end of every month.

Aliaa Hany - Egyptian Influencer

My subscribers are always looking for a promotional code, which encourages me to continue to collaborate with great pleasure.
